## SmartCardEnroll.canEnroll() method

Reads a card enrollment availability.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
canEnroll(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`

a fulfilled promise when a card can be enrolled, a rejected promise otherwise.
